wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|May}}
Events that occurred on 24 May.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1932]]''' - [[R.W. Chambers]] sends [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] an inscribed copy of ''[[Beowulf: An Introduction to the Study of the Poem]]''.
* '''[[1968]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to George Burke Johnston|a letter to George Burke Johnston]].
* '''[[1973]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is [[Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien|interviewed]] concerning the election to the Oxford Poetry chair.
* '''[[1973]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 350]].
* '''[[1981]]''' - The twelfth episode of the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|1981 radio adaptation]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' is aired on [[BBC|BBC Radio 4]].
* '''[[1992]]''' - [[The Tolkien Phenomenon]] ends in [[wikipedia:Turku|Turku]], [[wikipedia:Finland|Finland]].
* '''[[1994]]''' - [[Inklings|Inkling]] [[John Wain]] dies.
* '''[[2004]]''' - ''[[Understanding The Lord of the Rings]]'' is published.
* '''[[2014]]''' - ''[[Beowulf Launch Party]] hosted by [[The Tolkien Society]] and [[Middle-earth Network]] with support from Tolkien Brasil and The Tolkienist.
* '''[[2024]]''' - The online videogame ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Heroes of Middle-earth]]'' is discontinued online.

==In Arda==
:''There are no known events for this day.''<noinclude>[[Category:Dates|145]][[fi:24. toukokuuta]]</noinclude>
